argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfr.1 | |- F = recs ( G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( G ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( G ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 3 | 2 | #P_tfrlem7 | |- Fun recs ( G ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_funeqi | |- ( Fun F <-> Fun recs ( G ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpbir | |- Fun F |
| 6 | 2 | #P_tfrlem16 | |- Lim dom recs ( G ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_dmeqi | |- dom F = dom recs ( G ) |
| 8 |  | #P_limeq | |- ( dom F = dom recs ( G ) -> ( Lim dom F <-> Lim dom recs ( G ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( Lim dom F <-> Lim dom recs ( G ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_mpbir | |- Lim dom F |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( Fun F /\ Lim dom F ) |
